tool_description: Analyzes resume formatting for Applicant Tracking System compatibility and provides specific recommendations to improve parseability while maintaining visual appeal.

formatted_resume_content.description: Complete formatted resume content to analyze

layout_structure.description: Layout structure used in the resume

target_ats_systems.description: Specific ATS systems to optimize for

strictness_level.description: Compatibility checking strictness: strict, standard, or lenient

error_messages: Empty resume content: Provide formatted resume content for ATS analysis.
Invalid layout structure: Provide valid layout structure information.
Invalid font specifications: Provide valid typography specifications.
Unsupported ATS system: One or more specified ATS systems are not recognized.
Invalid strictness level: Use one of [strict, standard, lenient].
usage: Provide formatted resume content, layout structure, and font specifications. Optionally specify target ATS systems and strictness level. Returns compatibility score and improvement recommendations.

parsing_issues.description: Identified issues that may affect ATS parsing

improvement_recommendations.description: Specific recommendations to improve ATS compatibility

risk_assessment.description: Risk level assessment for ATS processing
